name: debugops-mcp
description: MCP server for debugging automation in VS Code

debugops-mcp.serverPath.description: Path to the DebugOpsMCP server executable. Leave empty for automatic detection.
debugops-mcp.serverPath.markdownDescription:
Specify the path to `DebugOpsMCP.Host.dll`. If empty, the extension will automatically search for the server in common locations: 

- `../core/src/DebugOpsMCP.Host/bin/Debug/net8.0/` 
- `../core/src/DebugOpsMCP.Host/bin/Release/net8.0/` 
- `./server/` 
- Same directory as extension

debugops-mcp.logLevel.description: Log level for the DebugOpsMCP server

debugops-mcp.autoStart.description: Automatically start the DebugOpsMCP server when VS Code opens

debugops-mcp.serverTimeout.description: Timeout in milliseconds for server startup

debugops-mcp.showServerOutput.description: Show server output in the VS Code output panel for debugging

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
